ams OSRAM is a global leader in intelligent sensors and emitters

Reshaping automotive lighting design.

News
ALIYOS™ LED-on-foil technology enables unprecedented effects in automotive lighting
Introducing the new ALIYOS™ technology from ams OSRAM: this innovative LED-on-foil technology enables unprecedented effects in automotive lighting, effects where the light comes almost out of nowhere.
New SYNIOS® P1515 family of automotive signaling LEDs produce extremely homogenous and smooth appearance in RCL applications
Robust, efficient, and small LEDs for automotive signaling applications.
ams OSRAM pushes the limits of lighting and sensing at SPIE Photonics West 2024
ams OSRAM to showcase its high-performance LEDs, lasers, sensors and integrated circuits at SPIE Photonics West in San Francisco, Calif., January 30 – February 1
Movano Health and ams OSRAM Collaborate to Deliver Accurate Lifestyle Monitoring Solutions for Women
Movano uses ams OSRAM´s sensor solution for their female-first wearable Evie Ring
ams OSRAM presents at CES 2024 how its intelligent sensors and emitters are improving driving, healthcare and AR/VR
Live demonstrations: ams OSRAM will showcase its latest LEDs, lasers, sensors and analog front ends at CES 2024 in Las Vegas, January 9-12, 2024, in an exclusive meeting room at the Venetian Expo.

Something important changed in consumersâ€™ feelings about cars when the automotive industry adopted LEDs as a superior alternative to traditional incandescent bulbs.
LEDs allowing car makers to associate a unique optical signature with their cars. Strikingly designed daytime running lights, a distinctive look for the rear lighting cluster, a unique blinking pattern in rear turn indicators: all became much easier to create after the introduction of LEDs. It became common for the first time for car users to have strong preferences about the way that their carâ€™s lights looked and operated. The best LED headlamps and rear lights became objects of desire.
And this is where the new ALIYOSâ„¢ technology comes in: this innovative LED-on-foil technology enables unprecedented effects in automotive lighting, effects where the light comes almost out of nowhere. Read Manuel Walchâ€™s blog to learn more: https://buff.ly/47Q0Ipv

results.raw_content:
ams OSRAM presents at CES 2024 how its intelligent sensors and emitters are improving driving, healthcare and AR/VR
ams OSRAM’s meeting space will include the following displays:
To schedule a media interview with ams OSRAM at CES, please contact Sarah Carlson at sarah.carlson@ams-osram.com. Visit the ams OSRAM Virtual Showroom to experience the company’s market-leading and award-winning optical solutions online.
About ams OSRAM
The ams OSRAM Group (SIX: AMS) is a global leader in intelligent sensors and emitters. By adding intelligence to light and passion to innovation, we enrich people’s lives.
With over 110 years of combined history, our core is defined by imagination, deep engineering expertise and the ability to provide global industrial capacity in sensor and light technologies. We create exciting innovations that enable our customers in the automotive, industrial, medical and consumer markets to maintain their competitive edge and drive innovation that meaningfully improves the quality of life in terms of health, safety and convenience, while reducing impact on the environment.
Our around 20,000 employees worldwide focus on innovation across sensing, illumination and visualization to make journeys safer, medical diagnosis more accurate and daily moments in communication a richer experience. Our work creates technology for breakthrough applications, which is reflected in over 15,000 patents granted and applied. Headquartered in Premstaetten/Graz (Austria) with a co-headquarters in Munich (Germany), the group achieved over EUR 4.8 billion revenues in 2022 and is listed as ams-OSRAM AG on the SIX Swiss Exchange (ISIN: AT0000A18XM4).
Find out more about us on https://ams-osram.com
ams is a registered trademark of ams-OSRAM AG. In addition, many of our products and services are registered or filed trademarks of ams OSRAM Group. All other company or product names mentioned herein may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners.

results.title: ams OSRAM Unveils Cutting-Edge Wearable Tech Innovations at CES 2024 ...
results.content: In conclusion, ams OSRAM's presence at CES 2024 highlights the company's commitment to advancing wearable technology. By showcasing their latest products and innovations, ams OSRAM demonstrates their expertise in optoelectronics and their dedication to shaping the future of wearables.
results.raw_content:
January 25, 2024
Technology products, solutions and news.
ams OSRAM Unveils Cutting-Edge Wearable Tech Innovations at CES 2024
Title: ams OSRAM Showcases Cutting-Edge Wearable Technology at CES 2024
At CES 2024, ams OSRAM, a leader in optoelectronic solutions, will unveil its latest innovations in wearable technology. The company’s diverse range of products, including LEDs, lasers, sensors, and analog front ends, are behind many of today’s most exciting advancements in the wearables industry.
Invited attendees will have the opportunity to experience live demonstrations of ams OSRAM’s industry-leading sensors, showcasing their capabilities and potential applications. One of the highlights will be a smartwatch demonstration featuring two recently released products: the OSRAM MULTILED SFH 7018 infrared LED and the AS7058 analog front end.
The SFH 7018 infrared LED significantly improves the quality and reliability of vital sign measurements for wearables. With a more than 40 percent increase in total radiant intensity compared to the previous product, this LED ensures accurate and precise readings. Meanwhile, the AS7058 analog front end boasts ultra-low noise characteristics, resulting in a high optical signal-to-noise ratio. This allows for reduced power consumption while maintaining excellent signal integrity.
By showcasing these advancements at CES 2024, ams OSRAM demonstrates its commitment to shaping the future of wearable technology. Whether it’s enhancing the safety of autonomous vehicles or improving vital sign monitoring in wearables, ams OSRAM continues to push the boundaries of what is possible in the industry.
As wearables become increasingly integrated into our daily lives, the demand for reliable and accurate sensor technology continues to grow. With its extensive portfolio of optoelectronic solutions, ams OSRAM is well-positioned to meet these demands and drive innovation in the wearables market.
CES 2024 serves as a platform for industry leaders like ams OSRAM to showcase their latest advancements and collaborate with other stakeholders in the technology sector. By participating in this prestigious event, ams OSRAM reaffirms its commitment to pushing the boundaries of wearable technology and contributing to the ongoing evolution of the industry.
With its focus on improving vital sign measurements and reducing power consumption, ams OSRAM’s latest products demonstrate the company’s dedication to enhancing the user experience of wearables. As the wearables market continues to expand, ams OSRAM remains at the forefront of innovation, driving the development of new and exciting applications for wearable technology.
In conclusion, ams OSRAM’s presence at CES 2024 highlights the company’s commitment to advancing wearable technology. By showcasing their latest products and innovations, ams OSRAM demonstrates their expertise in optoelectronics and their dedication to shaping the future of wearables. With their cutting-edge sensor technology, ams OSRAM is poised to play a significant role in the ongoing evolution of the wearables industry.
#WearableTechInnovation #AMSOSRAMatCES2024 #AdvancingWearables #OptoelectronicSolutions #SensorTechnology #ShapingTheFutureOfWearables
